title: Apple Car is already too late, says Tesla boss Elon Musk | Trusted Reviews
description: ![ElonMusk]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * https://twitter.com/statuses/652605371857530880**  Related:[WWDC 2016: What toexpect](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/wwdc-2016-date-stream-news-apple-keynote)**Apple hasn’t publicised plans to build an Apple Car, but it’s widelyspeculated that the company is already deeply invested in research anddevelopment for an electric (and possibly driverless) vehicle._You can read all about the[AppleCar](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-car-news-rumours-driverless-price-release-date-electric) here._**Ford Interview: The Future of Autonomous Cars****Do you think the Apple Car is already too late? Let us know in thecomments.**
